title: Monday Mini: The Marketing of Self-Defense
itunes:title: Monday Mini: The Marketing of Self-Defense
description:
Anney and Samantha dig into the capitalization of women's fear of sexual assault and why it's problematic. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
